Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Sarapamon

Text.Language: W pinis] m~vwct/r: pimane~cwou e#y#u#: abba Carapamwn pie~pickopoc: ouoh picwtp m~marturoc.
O great star, the holy shepherd, Abba Sarapamon the Bishop, the chosen martyr.

V/e~tafviri e~bol: qen ]nouni etc~marwout: n~te pinis] Ctevanoc: ouoh pisorp m~marturoc.
This is he who has blossomed, from the blessed root, of the great Stephen, the first martyr.

V/e~tafswpi n~refe~mi: afermeneuin n~nig~rav/ e#y#u#: hiten Pip~neuma e#y#u#: auywhem m~mof pimane~cwou.
Who became a teacher, he explained the holy Scriptures, through the Holy Spirit, they called him a shepherd.

Hiten tefo~mologia: e~qoun e~P,#c# penCwt/r: aferem~p~sa m~pi,~lom n~a~tlwm: n~te ]metmarturoc.
Through his confession, of Christ our Savior, he was worthy of the unfading crown, of martyrdom.
ÙˆØ¨Ø§Ø¹ØªØ±Ø§Ù?Ù‡ Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø³ÙŠØ­ Ù…Ø®Ù„ØµÙ†Ø§ Ø§Ø³ØªØ­Ù‚ Ø§Ù„Ø§ÙƒÙ„ÙŠÙ„ ØºÙŠØ± Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¶Ù…Ø­Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø°Ù‰ Ù„Ù„Ø´Ù‡Ø§Ø¯Ø©.
Afe~rsai nem nimarturoc: qen ]metouro n~te niv/oui: afounof m~mof nem P,#c#: qen t~,wra n~te n/e~tonq.
He celebrated with the martyrs, in the kingdom of heaven, he rejoiced with Christ, in the land of the living.

Wcautwc ten[ici m~mok: nem pihumnodoc Dauid: je n~yok pe piou/b sa e~neh: kata t~taxic m~Mel,icedek.
Likewise we magnify you, with David the psalmist, You are a priest forever, according to the order of Melchizedek.

Through his pleasant prayers, O Christ our Savior, grant us Your true peace, and the forgiveness of our sins.
